channel.title: poetry on jas/text
channel.description: Recent content in poetry on jas/text

item.title: Free Verse 1
item.description: Forgive the little motions which make subtle ripples rise that coalesce and grow to waves, to tides, to fearsome walls of water It is nothing like that now just a simple sound praying and pleading as though the ocean hears Indifferent though, breaking against deaf ears taking off the solitude of years

item.title: Limerick 1
item.description: It was lovely as love could be Only alone, you with me 'Til one day I saw Into life's gaping maw And ran away across the sea
